<title level="1" pfs="">[Astronomer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3590)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Different cultures have created stories about the hows and whys of the universe, if things exist beyond the stars, and if the gods manipulate the heavenly bodies. But astronomers aren't interested in folktales—they desire truth.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Astronomer.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Astronomer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3590)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 139

**Perception** +10

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35) +8, [Astronomy Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +12, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=44) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +1

**Con** +2

**Int** +4

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Living Sextant** If the astronomer is able to see the night sky, they can [Sense Direction](/Actions.aspx?ID=2406) using [Astronomy Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41).

**Items**
[Astrolabe](/Equipment.aspx?ID=846), spellbook, [Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +5 

**Will** +9 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 23

</row>

**Reject Myth** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature within 30 feet Casts a Spell or uses an ability with the [fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=612) or [misfortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=654) trait; **Effect** The astronomer's rejection of such fantasy becomes manifest. The astronomer attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the triggering effect with a counteract modifier of +9 and a counteract rank of 1.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
staff +7 ([two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 bludgeoning

**Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 17, attack +9
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Sigil](/Spells.aspx?ID=286), [Telekinetic Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=1715), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334)
- **1st**
[Alarm](/Spells.aspx?ID=7), [Gentle Landing](/Spells.aspx?ID=1542), [Phantasmal Minion](/Spells.aspx?ID=1631), [Sleep](/Spells.aspx?ID=288)

</column>
